lead_paragraph: Former British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton is to appeal against the organisation's ruling that he was guilty of sexist and discriminatory language.

headline.print_headline: Aussie Sutton to Appeal Against British Cycling Ruling
headline.main: Aussie Sutton to Appeal Against British Cycling Ruling

snippet: Former British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton is to appeal against the organisation's ruling that he was guilty of sexist and discriminatory language....
